name: dragon-scale
effect: Held by Seadra: Evolves the holder into Kingdra when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Seadra: Holder evolves into Kingdra.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A very tough and inflexible scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A very tough and inflexible scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A very tough and inflexible scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.
